## Description

Brief description of the changes.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Client feature (UI, service, ViewModel)
- [ ] Infrastructure (CI, templates, docs)
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] API contract change

## Checklist

- [ ] Does NOT change API contract (if it does, update `docs/api-contract.md`)
- [ ] Does NOT add engine assumptions (no hardcoded engine behavior)
- [ ] Does NOT add new transport logic (HTTP/WebSocket changes need contract review)
- [ ] UI-only change (no service layer impact)
- [ ] Tests pass

## API Contract Impact

- [ ] No contract impact
- [ ] Contract update required — link to `api-change` issue: #___
- [ ] Engine-side change required — link to engine issue: ___

## Notes

Any additional context for reviewers.
